QuestData.Title: The Eye of Twilight
QuestData.Description: The ogre clan across the lake is led by Gar'gol. I use the term loosely; Gar'gol has the intelligence of raw beef.$B$BSo far as I can tell, Gar'gol is taking orders from a magical instrument: "The Eye of Twilight." He follows its commands unquestioningly.$B$BIf we can sabotage the eye, we can cause unimaginable havoc.$B$BGo to Gar'gol's hovel and seek out the Eye of Twilight near the entrance. Study it. Find a way to subvert it. Ah, marvelous chaos...
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek out the Eye of Twilight near the entrance to Gar'gol's Hovel in Hyjal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Seek out the Eye of Twilight near the entrance to Gar'gol's Hovel in Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: <You approach the Eye of Twilight. As your fingertips graze its luminescent surface, you are aware of a malignant presence peering back at you, searching your soul.>$B$B<Instinctively, you draw back.>
